mapper.update:
update xm_potential
accountid = #{accountid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
contact_id = #{contactId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
potentialname = #{potentialname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
total = #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
currency = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
closingdate = #{closingdate,jdbcType=DATE},
typeofrevenue = #{typeofrevenue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nextstep = #{nextstep,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
private = #{private,jdbcType=INTEGER},
probability = #{probability,jdbcType=INTEGER},
campaignid = #{campaignid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sales_stage = #{salesStage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
potentialtype = #{potentialtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
leadsource = #{leadsource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
productid = #{productid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
productversion = #{productversion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quotationref = #{quotationref,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
partnercontact = #{partnercontact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
runtimefee = #{runtimefee,jdbcType=INTEGER},
followupdate = #{followupdate,jdbcType=DATE},
evaluationstatus = #{evaluationstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
forecastcategory = #{forecastcategory,jdbcType=INTEGER},
outcomeanalysis = #{outcomeanalysis,jdbcType=INTEGER},
probableamount = #{probableamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
smcreatorid = #{smcreatorid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
smownerid = #{smownerid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
modifiedby = #{modifiedby,jdbcType=INTEGER},
groupid = #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createdtime = #{createdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifiedtime = #{modifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
approved = #{approved,jdbcType=INTEGER},
approvedby = #{approvedby,jdbcType=INTEGER},
description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where potentialid = #{potentialid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update xm_potential set accountid = #{accountid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contact_id = #{contactId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, potentialname = #{potentialname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total = #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, currency = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, closingdate = #{closingdate,jdbcType=DATE}, typeofrevenue = #{typeofrevenue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nextstep = #{nextstep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, private = #{private,jdbcType=INTEGER}, probability = #{probability,jdbcType=INTEGER}, campaignid = #{campaignid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sales_stage = #{salesStage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, potentialtype = #{potentialtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, leadsource = #{leadsource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, productid = #{productid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, productversion = #{productversion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quotationref = #{quotationref,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, partnercontact = #{partnercontact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, runtimefee = #{runtimefee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, followupdate = #{followupdate,jdbcType=DATE}, evaluationstatus = #{evaluationstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, forecastcategory = #{forecastcategory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, outcomeanalysis = #{outcomeanalysis,jdbcType=INTEGER}, probableamount = #{probableamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, smcreatorid = #{smcreatorid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, smownerid = #{smownerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modifiedby = #{modifiedby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, groupid = #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createdtime = #{createdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifiedtime = #{modifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, approved = #{approved,jdbcType=INTEGER}, approvedby = #{approvedby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where potentialid = #{potentialid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update xm_potential set accountid = #{accountid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contact_id = #{contactId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, potentialname = #{potentialname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total = #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, currency = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, closingdate = #{closingdate,jdbcType=DATE}, typeofrevenue = #{typeofrevenue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nextstep = #{nextstep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, private = #{private,jdbcType=INTEGER}, probability = #{probability,jdbcType=INTEGER}, campaignid = #{campaignid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sales_stage = #{salesStage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, potentialtype = #{potentialtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, leadsource = #{leadsource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, productid = #{productid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, productversion = #{productversion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quotationref = #{quotationref,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, partnercontact = #{partnercontact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, runtimefee = #{runtimefee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, followupdate = #{followupdate,jdbcType=DATE}, evaluationstatus = #{evaluationstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, forecastcategory = #{forecastcategory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, outcomeanalysis = #{outcomeanalysis,jdbcType=INTEGER}, probableamount = #{probableamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, smcreatorid = #{smcreatorid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, smownerid = #{smownerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modifiedby = #{modifiedby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, groupid = #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createdtime = #{createdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifiedtime = #{modifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, approved = #{approved,jdbcType=INTEGER}, approvedby = #{approvedby,jdbcType=INTEGER} where potentialid = #{potentialid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS count FROM xm_potential LEFT JOIN xm_account ON xm_potential.accountid = xm_account.accountid LEFT JOIN xm_users ON xm_users.id = xm_potential.smownerid WHERE 1=1 ${filter}

SELECT xm_potential.*,xm_account.accountname FROM xm_potential LEFT JOIN xm_account ON xm_potential.accountid = xm_account.accountid LEFT JOIN xm_users ON xm_users.id = xm_potential.smownerid WHERE 1=1 ${filter} limit #{start},#{rows}

SELECT xm_potential.* FROM xm_potential LEFT JOIN xm_account ON xm_potential.accountid = xm_account.accountid LEFT JOIN xm_users ON xm_users.id = xm_potential.smownerid WHERE xm_potential.deleted = 0 AND xm_potential.sales_stage <> '谈成结束' AND xm_potential.sales_stage <> '未成结束' AND xm_potential.smownerid='1' ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 0,10

SELECT count(*) FROM xm_potential INNER JOIN xm_account ON xm_potential.accountid = xm_account.accountid LEFT JOIN xm_users ON xm_users.id = xm_potential.smownerid where xm_potential.deleted=0 and xm_potential.smownerid in (${range}) and xm_potential.closingdate >= '${firstday}' and xm_potential.closingdate <= '${lastday}' and xm_potential.sales_stage = #{colvalue}
select count(*) as rowsnum from xm_potential WHERE deleted =0 AND smownerid='${userid}' and createdtime between '${start} 00:00:00' and '${end} 23:59:00';
